Post.title: EventLoop
Post._content:
### EventLoop
>  tick task

- V8
- IO
- IO
-   tick(process.nextTick())

<!-- more -->

### 
microtasks()
> microtasks
- process.nextTick
- promise
- Object.observe
- MutationObserver

macrotask()
- setTimeout
- serInterval
- setImmediate
- I/O
- UI

>  

async await  


```
(new Promise(resolve => {
  console.log('resolve')
  resolve()
}))
.then(() => console.log('promise then ...'))

async function fun(){
  console.log("fun start")
  const aa = await 1 // 
  console.log("fun end")
}
fun()

// setTimeout event table 1event queue
setTimeout(() => {
  console.log('setTimeout ...')
}, 0)

process.nextTick(() => {
  console.log('nextTick ...')
})

console.log('console ...')


// output
resolve
fun start
console ...
nextTick ...
promise then ...
fun end
setTimeout ...
```
Post.raw:

```
  const aa = await 1 //

}
fun()

// setTimeout event table 1event queue

  console.log('setTimeout ...')

console ...
nextTick ...
promise then ...
fun end
setTimeout ...
```

Post.title: hexo
Post._content:
hexo

hexo 

<!-- more -->

### 
* Git
* Node.js
* Hexo
* GitHub
* SSHGitHub
* hexoGitHub


### 1.gitnode
gitnode, 
[git](https://www.liaoxuefeng.com/wiki/0013739516305929606dd18361248578c67b8067c8c017b000)
[node](http://nodejs.cn/download/)


### 2.hexo
gitnodehexo
1. :myBlog

2.Windows  `npm install -g hexo`
mac `sudo npm install --unsafe-perm --verbose -g hexo`
 `hexo -v` hexo
3.hexo `hexo init`
myBlog

|            |                                                   |
| -------------- | ----------------------------------------------------- |
| node_modules |                                               |
| public       |             |
| scaffolds    |                                   |
| source       | markdown_drafts_posts |
| themes       |                                                   |
| _config.yml  |                                         |
| package.json |                             |

 `_config.yml` 
`source` 
 `themes`.

4.
`hexo g`
`hexo s`
 `http://localhost:4000` 
`ctrl+c`  `control+c` 

### GitHub
github

![Create a new repository](buildHexo/hexo1.jpg)
username
![](buildHexo/hexo2.jpg)
create repository

### SSHGitHub(mac)
1.SSH Key
 `ls -al ~/.ssh`
2.id_rsa.pub  id_dsa.pubSSH Key
`cat ~/.ssh/id_rsa.pub`

3.id_rsa.pub  id_dsa.pubSSH Key
`ssh-keygen -t rsa -C "your_full_name@xxxxx.com"`

 
GitHubsetting![](buildHexo/hexo3.jpg)
SSH and GPG keys![](buildHexo/hexo4.jpg)
New SSH keykey Add SSH keyok
![](buildHexo/hexo5.jpg)

### hexoGitHub
hexogithub
1. `_config.yml` 
```
deploy:
  type: git
  repo: https://github.com/YourgithubName/YourgithubName.github.io.git
  branch: master
```

```
repo: https://github.com/Yu-Lxy/Yu-Lxy.github.io
```
*  `hexo d` 

2.deploy-git,,GitHub:
`npm install hexo-deployer-git --save`
3.
`hexo g`
`hexo d`
 `http://yourname.github.io` hexo~

Post.title: vue+koa+mysqltodolist
Post._content:
## Start

 `koa` api `vue` demotodolist `Vue` `koa`  `token``sequelize`  `mysql` 

<!-- more -->
## 

vue-cli2webpack
```
yarn 
yarn add koa koa-router koa-logger koa-json koa-bodyparser nodemon vue-router element-ui axios koa-jwt bcrypt kao-static
```
> server
> - config
> - controllers""
> - models
> - routes
> - schema

> app.jskoa

 `nodemon app.js`, `Koa is listening in 8889`8889
 `npm run dev`  `localhost:8080` 


## mysql
`mysql``MySQLWorkbench`



user

|            |                                                   |
| -------------- | ----------------------------------------------------- |
| id(id) | int()                                              |
| user_name()       | CHAR(50)            |
| password()   | CHAR(128)                            |


list

|            |                                                   |
| -------------- | ----------------------------------------------------- |
| id(listid) | int()                                              |
| user_id(id)       | int(11)            |
| content()    | CHAR(255)                            |
| status()    | tinyint(1)                            |


## Sequelize
`sequelize` ORM

`server/schema` user.jslist.jssequelize-auto

`server/config`db.js, Sequelize

## JSON-WEB-TOKEN
JSON-WEB-TOKEN
> 1. 
> 2. tokentoken
> 3. tokentoken
> 4. token

tokentokenCDN``

```
<!--  -->

const secret = 'vue-koa-demo' // token

jwt.sign(userToken, secret) // token

jwt.decode(token) // token
```

## 
md5`bcrypt`
```
// 
bcrypt.compareSync(data.password, userInfo.password)
```

## Token
`Header``Authorization` `Bearer token`
```
Vue.prototype.$http.defaults.headers.common['Authorization'] = 'Bearer ' + token
```
/api/* token
```
koa.use("/api",jwt({secret: 'vue-koa-demo'}),api.routes()) // /api/jwtsecretsecret
```

## Koa serve
`npm run dev`
```
const serve = require('koa-static')

app.use(serve(path.join(__dirname, 'dist'))) // webpackKoa
```
localhost:8889


## End
demo[Github](https://github.com/Yu-Lxy/Daily_practice/tree/master/koa)

## Start

 `koa` api `vue` demotodolist `Vue` `koa`  `token``sequelize`  `mysql` 

<!-- more -->
## 

vue-cli2webpack
```
yarn 
yarn add koa koa-router koa-logger koa-json koa-bodyparser nodemon vue-router element-ui axios koa-jwt bcrypt kao-static
```
> server
> - config
> - controllers""
> - models
> - routes
> - schema

> app.jskoa

 `nodemon app.js`, `Koa is listening in 8889`8889
 `npm run dev`  `localhost:8080` 


## mysql
`mysql``MySQLWorkbench`



user

|            |                                                   |
| -------------- | ----------------------------------------------------- |
| id(id) | int()                                              |
| user_name()       | CHAR(50)            |
| password()   | CHAR(128)                            |


list

|            |                                                   |
| -------------- | ----------------------------------------------------- |
| id(listid) | int()                                              |
| user_id(id)       | int(11)            |
| content()    | CHAR(255)                            |
| status()    | tinyint(1)                            |


## Sequelize
`sequelize` ORM

`server/schema` user.jslist.jssequelize-auto

`server/config`db.js, Sequelize

## JSON-WEB-TOKEN
JSON-WEB-TOKEN
> 1. 
> 2. tokentoken
> 3. tokentoken
> 4. token

tokentokenCDN``

```
<!--  -->

const secret = 'vue-koa-demo' // token

jwt.sign(userToken, secret) // token

jwt.decode(token) // token
```

## 
md5`bcrypt`
```
// 
bcrypt.compareSync(data.password, userInfo.password)
```

## Token
`Header``Authorization` `Bearer token`
```
Vue.prototype.$http.defaults.headers.common['Authorization'] = 'Bearer ' + token
```
/api/* token
```
koa.use("/api",jwt({secret: 'vue-koa-demo'}),api.routes()) // /api/jwtsecretsecret
```

## Koa serve
`npm run dev`
```
const serve = require('koa-static')

app.use(serve(path.join(__dirname, 'dist'))) // webpackKoa
```
localhost:8889


## End
demo[Github](https://github.com/Yu-Lxy/Daily_practice/tree/master/koa)

Post.title: vue+vue-ueditor-wrap+
Post._content: ueditor+githubvueueditorgetContentsetContent [vue-ueditor-wrap](https://github.com/HaoChuan9421/vue-ueditor-wrap) so~ vue+vue-ueditor-wrap+. **ueditor** 1. https://ueditor.baidu.com/website/download.html 2. VuestaticUEditor **vue-ueditor-wrap** ```javascript npm i vue-ueditor-wrap ``` **** 1. main.js ```javascript // The Vue build version to load with the `import` command // (runtime-only or standalone) has been set in webpack.base.conf with an alias. import Vue from 'vue' import App from './App' import router from './router' // ueditor import '../static/UEditor/ueditor.config' import '../static/UEditor/ueditor.all.min.js' import '../static/UEditor/lang/zh-cn/zh-cn.js' import '../static/UEditor/ueditor.parse.min.js' Vue.config.productionTip = false /* eslint-disable no-new */ new Vue({ el: '#app', router, components: { App }, template: '' }) ``` 2. ```javascript ``` `ueditor` ? ****? **ueditor** [UEditor](http://hgs.xiumi.us/uedit/) 1. index.html `http://xiumi.us/connect/ue/xiumi-ue-dialog-v5.js` `http://xiumi.us/connect/ue/xiumi-ue-v5.css` UEditor ```javascript ``` 2. `http://xiumi.us/connect/ue/xiumi-ue-dialog-v5.html` `http://hgs.xiumi.us/uedit/dialogs/internal.js` UEditor 3. `UEditor`ueditor.config.js414section:[] section:['class', 'style']ueditor 4. `xiumi-ue-dialog-v5.js``iframeUrl`H5`/static/UEditor/xiumi-ue-dialog-v5.html` ueditor [](http://ent.xiumi.us/) [demo](https://github.com/Yu-Lxy/vue-ueditor-wrap-xiumi) ![](xiumi/1599127298698.jpg)

VuestaticUEditor **vue-ueditor-wrap** ```javascript npm i vue-ueditor-wrap ``` **** 1. main.js ```javascript // The Vue build version to load with the `import` command // (runtime-only or standalone) has been set in webpack.base.conf with an alias. import Vue from 'vue' import App from './App' import router from './router' // ueditor import '../static/UEditor/ueditor.config' import '../static/UEditor/ueditor.all.min.js' import '../static/UEditor/lang/zh-cn/zh-cn.js' import '../static/UEditor/ueditor.parse.min.js' Vue.config.productionTip = false /* eslint-disable no-new */ new Vue({ el: '#app', router, components: { App }, template: '' }) ``` 2. ```javascript ``` `ueditor` ? ****? **ueditor** [UEditor](http://hgs.xiumi.us/uedit/) 1. index.html `http://xiumi.us/connect/ue/xiumi-ue-dialog-v5.js` `http://xiumi.us/connect/ue/xiumi-ue-v5.css` UEditor ```javascript ``` 2. `http://xiumi.us/connect/ue/xiumi-ue-dialog-v5.html` `http://hgs.xiumi.us/uedit/dialogs/internal.js` UEditor 3. `UEditor`ueditor.config.js414section:[] section:['class', 'style']ueditor 4. `xiumi-ue-dialog-v5.js``iframeUrl`H5`/static/UEditor/xiumi-ue-dialog-v5.html` ueditor [](http://ent.xiumi.us/) [demo](https://github.com/Yu-Lxy/vue-ueditor-wrap-xiumi) ![](xiumi/1599127298698.jpg)
